website_summaries.verdict: The $30 RHA MA390 Universal earphones outperform more expensive options in both design and audio performance.
pros: Handsome design with quality materials and a decent array of included accessories
cons: Mids are scooped out a bit

customer_reviews.title: Headphones arrived in faulty condition
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I started using the headphones I noticed that the sound was phasing in and out between the ears, this seemed to become worse if the wire was moved in any way around the mic/control part of the cable. Such as a shame as I had heard good things about these headphones. I called amazon and they were good enough to provide a refund over the phone. I will not buy these headphones again as if they demonstrated the clear weakness in the cable after just minutes of use, it would indicate a deficiency that would likely occur at some point in the future with a new set.
customer_reviews.author: A. C. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Crisp highs
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Crisp highs, tight mids, smooth lows; have to be the best quality budget earphones on the market right now (and I am an audio engineer). Really well branded company & great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Gets tangled too easily. The braided cord feels clumsy and always seems to get in the way. The clip is really cheap and sticks out in the way. The smallest earbud is too big for my ears so they don't stay in. I'm going to replace these with the skull candy smokin buds and these will be a backup but I'd never buy these again. Also, because they're black (my old ones were red) they are hard to find when you're rushing out.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: earpieces too big
customer_reviews.text: I tried to put the smallest ear pieces in but was a real struggle. I almost gave up until I googled it and found a youtube video showing you how to replace the earpiece covers (you turn them inside out so the white bit is lifted up, then you put one side of the black bit on one edge and then slide the other edge over). So with the video I managed to get one of the small earpieces on (didn't manage to get the other earpiece on), but after all that trouble, even the smallest earpiece was too big for my ear and it just fell straight out.
customer_reviews.author: The Hungry Meerkat

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound and quality for little cost
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my wife. They are used when travelling on aircraft. One of the supplied pairs of earpieces have provided my wife with excellent noise isolation. She listens to music via Tidal at hifi quality and is very pleased with the quality and openess of the sound compared to a pair of Bose in ears which she used to use. The RHA MA390's are also a fraction of the price. I had a pair of RHA MA 650i's whiched stopped working. I will now be replacing them with another set as using Sen Momentums for travel is tedious.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound Stage is actually really impressive
customer_reviews.text: yeah, I'm actually really impressed. feel like for their size and price they preform really well. I went from over ear to there and I actually occasionally forget I'm not wearing over-ear headphones. I've had them for about a month and the only negative I can see is that maybe the material on the cable might start to fray if you're a bit rough (which I am) but that's to be expected with any material cable.
customer_reviews.author: Will C

customer_reviews.title: Sound Great
customer_reviews.text: They sound great for cheap on the go earphones. RHA also keep their world on that 3 year warranty which is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Mikolaj

customer_reviews.title: Great build and sound.
customer_reviews.text: I paired these earphones with a chord mojo to get the best sound possible before giving my opinion. They have a detailed sound with good separation and slightly bigger sound stage than expected although the treble is quite smooth they have the RHA sizzle and metallic tone I have heard in their higher end models, also there is quite a bit of bass bleed in to mids so aren’t as clear as I would like. All this said it’s still above the rest and probably one of the best or the best earphone around for £20.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality and sturdy build quality
customer_reviews.text: fFor the price range, these are the best earphones I've ever had. My only issue is the control button is sometimes fidgety, it doesn't click very well and sometimes doesn't seem to register a press as a result. Handles highs and lows incredibly well, cable and buds are very sturdy, and fits comfortably So far 8 months of heavy use and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: S. Seymour

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but falling apart
customer_reviews.text: I had these earphones for a few months now and I already had to superglue bits together (one of the earphones fell apart, and now the headphone jack has fallen apart). Sound quality is decent, but I'd rather have them be more durable. Won't be buying another pair of those.
customer_reviews.author: Ashes

customer_reviews.title: Returned as faulty after a few months
customer_reviews.text: I didn't love the sound of these straight off. A bit tinny to my ears. After a few months of average use the volume on 1 side became much less than the other. Also had a nasty rattling sound with some sounds at certain frequencies. They looked nice enough and came well packaged. Amazon was quick to refund when I returned the faulty goods. I have since bought Betron headphones which were quite a bit cheaper and I prefer their sound. Maybe the RHAs I had were just a bad set.
customer_reviews.author: IMHO

customer_reviews.title: ... for quite a while now and have never been disappointed. This model is excellent with a great build ...
customer_reviews.text: Have been using RHA for quite a while now and have never been disappointed . This model is excellent with a great build quality and a sound to match. They fit nice and snug in the ear and come with 3 sizes of bud to ensure maximum comfort.. This model also comes with a 3 year warranty which shows RHA's confidence in their product, with all this and a great price you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: mark toddington

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working properly after a couple of months
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for personal use - listening to music/podcasts. Sound quality quite good but not high. I find buds much more comfortable in my ears so paid a little more than the budget ones to ensure they would be a bit more robust. Took care of them so quite disappointed. On the plus side they have a decently long cable which is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Had 2, both rubbish
customer_reviews.text: I had two pairs of these and both went wrong within a month! Good while they worked
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, but useless control
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, but useless control. It's multi-function, but that function is stop/start only. Plus the stop/start didn't actually work on my iPhone 8. Still getting a lot of feedback sound from the cable rubbing against my collar - more so than on other brands for some reason. I sent mine back for the non-functioning control.
customer_reviews.author: James S-W

customer_reviews.title: Very clear sound but lacking bass.
customer_reviews.text: These earphones are brilliant value for money. The clarity is studio quality which is as expected at the sacrifice of bass. Will they be beaten for the money? Maybe by the Cambridge audio's but they never seen to be in stock.
customer_reviews.author: SkilledNutter

customer_reviews.title: Crackling after 10 days' use
customer_reviews.text: I never leave reviews, but I was really excited about these headphones being "the best earbuds you can buy under £30" and these are not that. Sound quality was great, packaging beautiful, headphones themselves feel quality but they lasted 10 days before they started crackling. Like that crackling that comes before an earbud cutting out altogether. 10 days. Of light usage. Maybe an hour or two a day. Couldn't return as I'd already thrown out the packaging for them, but I will not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: lucy

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is pretty good. Not an audiophile so can't really comment ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is pretty good. Not an audiophile so can't really comment much more on that. Build quality feels solid other than the mic/controls bit which feels a bit cheap and mine rattles a bit. The cable is long - longer than a typical earphone cable, which is nice. The earphones themselves are quite small and minimalist and are very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: expected bit better for the price
customer_reviews.text: they do an alright job at blocking out the awful music some of my inconsiderate house mates listen to at loud volumes but you still need to turn up whatever you're listening to. however they do not fit as well in the ear as other in-ear headphones i've had and they often fall out when i wear them on the bus or when walking. on the plus they do sound very good. shame the whole cable isn't covered in the fabric material and unfortunately you get a lot of noise when you brush the cables.
customer_reviews.author: louise

customer_reviews.title: Tedious Earpeice System
customer_reviews.text: Still struggling to replace the earbuds since they come with strangely oversized ones.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality and comfort however I cannot find the volume control. I have found the pause and skip to next song. It comes with a small pouch and variety of silicone pads for the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, didn’t last a week
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible. I bought these to replace the slightly more expensive pair in the range which died after around 3 months. These died after just A WEEK of normal use.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Best but undurable headphones
customer_reviews.text: They work perfectly but after 2 months the right earphone has stopped working due to a problem with the wire. It has had heavy use but hasnt been roughly used. The warranty is annoying due to the amount of steps but i will try to get a replacement and so far they have been very helpful and easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron glover

customer_reviews.title: best ear buds ive had
customer_reviews.text: ive 3 pairs of earphones had many more (cat has destroyed many pairs) im a dj and i know audio, these are brilliant for the price and the build quality is 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny no knees

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Despite this product having a 3 year warranty it only just lasted past the 30 days return policy with Amazon. I will be following this u with RHA but wanted to warn everyone...
customer_reviews.author: Rob A

customer_reviews.title: Great Budget Earphones
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these earphones from the Amazon Warehouse - the condition was exactly as described. The sound quality of these earphones is very good considering the price, frankly not a huge difference from earphones that cost five times the amount. I noticed a little bit of sharpness at the high end but they will no doubt settle in as they are used.
customer_reviews.author: R. James

customer_reviews.title: Great while they lasted.
customer_reviews.text: The headphones sound great. The only downside is the microphone stopped working (in a little less than a month). This is a pain since no one can hear me anymore and so I've gone back to my beltron ones that are maybe 1 star less in sound quality but at least I'm audible to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sid

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good value for money headphones, that feel like a quality product. Don’t sound as dazzling as the Sennheisers or the Bose earphones I’ve had before but still sound, but for less than half the price that’s to be expected. They fit quite well, but the tips are a little firm and not quite as snug as others I’ve used. They do work well and are comfortable once in. Long story short - great for £20.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Stoddart

customer_reviews.title: Not up to scratch
customer_reviews.text: Good build quality, well packaged and arrived in a timely manner. The problem was with the volume not good enough for the daily commute and far worse than similarly priced Bluetooth ear buds I had previously. They were fine for listening at home or in quiet environments. Also note the noise from the cables was unbearable. Disappointed considering the reviews for this item. In the process of returning them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Suprisingly good value
customer_reviews.text: Given the price, the build quality and sound make for a pleasant surprise. If you need a cheap workhorse, start here.
customer_reviews.author: Paddler

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, revolting durability
customer_reviews.text: Bass is great, highs can be rough sometimes, but overall very balanced and great sounds. However one of the earbuds failed so I contacted RHA customer care for a replacement under the warranty, which they were very helpful with. But the same soon happened to the replacement pair where one of the two earbuds began to fail
customer_reviews.author: Scott McKearney

customer_reviews.title: RHA MA 390 In Ear Headphones.
customer_reviews.text: RHA MA 390 Bought these for my son who is very happy with them,Good price ,look well made and arrived well in time.
customer_reviews.author: Music Shiver

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and great value
customer_reviews.text: Not normally one to write a review but after doing a bit of research on some new headphones and not wanting to spend a fortune I came across these, I felt compelled! I can honestly say these are the best I've owned, sound quality is excellent, good punchy bass and you get a mic, extra rubber ear cups and a nice little bag as well, grab yourself an absolute bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Ruairi

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have stopped working within 4 months of buying them and cannot find how to contact the company to replace them as they have a 3 year warranty
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seriously a very good earphone
customer_reviews.text: The earphone is really good in build quality and durability. It's made of aluminium and wire is half braided for rigidity. The sound quality is excellent too. There is enough base but not so high as other high base focused earphone. The vocal are really clear and decent. A superb earphone not to be ignored at this price tag.
customer_reviews.author: B. Ale

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Personally preferred the sound quality of the Beyerdynamic Byron's, but for half the price and the better build quality, these are well worth it. (The Bayer's died after a few months of use, in fairness I am quite rough with my headphones though.)
customer_reviews.author: Mr. J. N. Spratley

customer_reviews.title: Super easily breakable.
customer_reviews.text: I liked them at first, but discovered they fell out my ears a lot, despite trying the different sizes of ear pieces. Earphones have now broken 4 months later, despite taking very great care of them. I guess they were super cheaply made. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: The durability is pretty awful.
customer_reviews.text: I got these a couple of months ago, but the glue on the left earphone has already worn out! It rendered the left earphone useless and dangling by its wires... I'm looking to contact the seller for a refund as that's pretty terrible. The sound quality and comfort were pretty excellent though!
customer_reviews.author: Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Broke down after one month
customer_reviews.text: One of the earphone came out from the main wire after one month of constant use.. Good quality of the sound but really bad durability
customer_reviews.author: roberto magnani

customer_reviews.title: Really good sound - But wire length too long
customer_reviews.text: Really good sound, the shape of the earbuds make them near enough noise cancelling but the length of the wire is too long to have them in your phone on the go - The excess wire can be annoying and have caught it a few times. Would recommend if you're plugging them into a desktop though.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very good headphones, so good have brought another as present.
customer_reviews.author: hassers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Cannot fault given the price - much better than comparable cheap earphones
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Worst quality, pin broke with 2/3 uses, wire is not so sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is okay don't expect any high bass. The connector pin and the cable are not sturdy. the pin broke with 2/3 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Shrinivas Reddy

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. Good sound quality, nice bass and sub-bass, but not too strong. Highs are nice, and don't distort. Definitely worth the price. Better than rock zircon, or any of the like.
customer_reviews.author: D.C

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Thoroughly disappointing that this is an amazon recommended product - have been through three pairs now and the flex survives less than five months of normal use. On top of that, from day one the hands free mic only worked intermittently. This was the case for all three pairs of this model of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Just because they’re cheap, it doesn’t mean they’re average.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have a bright, energetic sound signature with an adequate amount of low-end punch for an engaging listen, so they’re well-suited for popular, chart-topping music. They’re also extremely comfortable to use and their build quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the reviews claim
customer_reviews.text: Standard headphones for this price range. Nothing too bad to say about them but won't be raving about them either
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Is brilliant at silencing outside noise and can be loud in its own right. Sound quality is amazing especially for the price. Very comfortable as well and fits on ear with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately not as good as other reviews say
customer_reviews.text: I am no audiophile but found the sound really lacking sadly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hands down my goto headphones
customer_reviews.text: Theyre to date my goto headphones for comfort, sound quality, staying in the ear on the move, doubling up as telephone headphones. Literally good all rounders and worth the extra pennies over the cheaper ones out there.
customer_reviews.author: Mr J Schoonbrood

customer_reviews.title: Amazing budget headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Great set of earphones been using every day now for podcasts and they feel great. Would highly recommend these as a good quality budget set. They have braided sieve on the lower part too which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: M.Biddle

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding, but left ear broke within a month and a half.
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding, but left ear broke within a month and a half. Left ear is extremely quiet on full volume. Is it possible to get refunded for this?
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Locke

customer_reviews.title: RHA MA350
customer_reviews.text: Good clear sound but light on base, which is ok to use with my laptop. The only slight annoyance is they occasionally fall out
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Was good at first but stopped working quickly. Please give me replacement on warranty.
customer_reviews.text: Sounded good at first, after the first month the left earphone stopped working randomly. No damage to it just stopped working. It says on your description there is 3 year warranty, please can you give me a replacement pair.. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Yogalynne

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: After a few months of regular use these have failed on one side
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after <6 months
customer_reviews.text: Left ear stopped working after 6 months of fairly careful handling. Ears are not L or R specific so don't quite fit either. Not one for repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Magic to my ears!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, good quality, controls took a little while to sort out. But overall, great!
customer_reviews.author: taxi rank

customer_reviews.title: Good sound at a low price
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised. For £20 the sound and comfort is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Archer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Remote doesn’t work with phone. Microphone poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Had heard good things about RHA and expected more. Sound quality is OK but most important is the microphone is shoddy and remote doesn’t work with my iPhone as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: not super comfy to wear
customer_reviews.text: the headphones work well but they don’t fit my ears great and i constantly have to push them back in so they get a bit annoying
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.title: hurts to wear. so... literally cant use them.
customer_reviews.text: sound is okay, durability might be okay if i COULD wear them and test them out :) but i cant. not for meeee, waste of moneyyyyyyyy
customer_reviews.author: sasori-kys

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it for this price👎
customer_reviews.text: Stoped working in one month just one ear piece is working not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Jayesh vaz

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous value for money. Great sounding earphones. Only small quibble is that the sharp edges of the mic keep catching on clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality
customer_reviews.text: Great build quality. Very long cable. You can control playback but not volume. Quite a tinny sound but ok for £20
customer_reviews.author: eneah

customer_reviews.title: Extremely resilient
customer_reviews.text: Really awesome earphone extremely resilient ,I've had for months now (and I'm not careful with them had them in the gym,cycling,thrown in a bag) and they are still going ,throughly recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: aoife harrington

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: Used the warranty three times. Not that durable but sound quality is good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: These have great sound quality and are really comfortable in ear headphones
customer_reviews.author: David Berry

customer_reviews.title: Appreciated Gift
customer_reviews.text: They were a gift, but are appreciated and used regularly. No problems with order.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones for the price. Nice bass and treble without needing to play with the EQs. Not really owned them that long so I can't really comment on durability.
customer_reviews.author: R Pimblett

customer_reviews.title: I only buy RHA earphones
customer_reviews.text: Very good earphones, not had any issues, does what it supposed to. I always stick to RHA earphones myself.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ada

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, short lived
customer_reviews.text: These are great value, incredible sound for the price and fit my ears perfectly. But despite this, the right ear began buzzing occasionally after five months of continuous use. Finally stopped working all together after six months. I would encourage others to spend some more for better lifespan.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it for price
customer_reviews.text: For under half the price you can get earphones that have same quality. Changing the ear buds on these was very difficult. The small buds don't even fit the earphones.
customer_reviews.author: Mustafiz Raj

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within a few months
customer_reviews.text: It's been only a couple of months since I bought this headphones and the right one it's not stopped working
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and sound.
customer_reviews.text: £20 with a 3 year warranty, what’s not to like. Sound is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: S. Grist

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice weight, extremely comfy, good choice of materials along with nice carrier bag
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five star
customer_reviews.text: Great quality headphones complimented by great customer service from RHA. Recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Calum Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof??
customer_reviews.text: Are these waterproof lmao? Ive put them in the washing machine accidently so many times yet they still work perfectly fine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth £20
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant , comfortable and great sound ! They have broken leaving only one earphone working .
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy design
customer_reviews.text: Nice design looks and feels durable more on the bass heavy side than clear flat, would be nice if it had volume controls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tight fitting earphones
customer_reviews.text: Good sound. Fits well and tight to ear and isolates noise. They keep tight in the ear when jogging and walking which is not the case with many other earphones
customer_reviews.author: Kalevi Sihvonen

customer_reviews.title: Brittle
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones but the sound went on one ear after 8 months of light use.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Ross McGuinness

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: The headphones fit my ears perfectly, they arrive with a convenient headphone case and sound is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: irene

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Product lasted1 and half months and with shipping was only £5 cheaper than Apple. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps breaking
customer_reviews.text: Keeps breaking within 3 months. They replace and it just breaks again. Really cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You will not get a better sounding pair of headphones for the same money...!
customer_reviews.text: RHA always sound great..I’ve bought possibly 10 pairs,the reliability let’s them down tho..
customer_reviews.author: James kenny

customer_reviews.title: Good entry-level buds, with much space to improve
customer_reviews.text: For the price they are alright. Lower bass response, mid-bass bump, far from flat but not over eq'ed.
customer_reviews.author: Simón Palominos Mandiola

customer_reviews.title: Super sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this ear buds, for the price this is far superior to many other overpriced ones.
customer_reviews.author: J Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Nice IEMs for a decent price
customer_reviews.text: Warm sound, comfortable to wear. Pitty there are no sound controls, only mic.
customer_reviews.author: Gorjan Kepeski

customer_reviews.title: Fantabulous
customer_reviews.text: One of the buds has dismembered now after a lot of use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent audio quality poor hardware quality
customer_reviews.text: Good head phones but very flimsy broke after 3-4 months use
customer_reviews.author: alec jetha

customer_reviews.title: Poor durability, excellent quality sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality but I lost sound in one earpiece after 2 months. shame
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Good value product. Scores entered as per this price range of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Ella B

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality isn't bad for £20
customer_reviews.text: If you have used RHA product before then you may be expecting the earbuds to be a bit bigger, I found them quite a bit smaller than the similarly shaped MA650i wireless, and would have preferred them to be larger, but I suppose this works both ways if you have smaller ears. The sound quality isn't bad for £20, I've used the for a little while and they were good. What let them down for me is the remote; it's crude and bulky and snags on things. A slimmer more ergonomic piece would have been preferred as I'm worried these will catch coming out of a bag and pull the cord loose.
customer_reviews.author: LusoAma

customer_reviews.title: Wire quality is very bad.
customer_reviews.text: Sound is ok, but the quality of the wire is horrible. The earphones keeps disconnecting whenever i keep my phone in my pocket. Any pressure on the wire, even when im walking or going up the stairs causes the earphones to diaconnect from the phone. Very frustrating. Never had this kinda problem with any other earphones. And i had this problem since day i got it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought in November, have just stopped working now in April. Incredibly short life for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha V.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality - avoid!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. I had to return the original item for a replacement within months of purchase as one earphone stopped working. Now the replacement has exactly the same fault.
customer_reviews.author: Aidan

customer_reviews.title: Interior earphone
customer_reviews.text: Bought for present. All feedback very positive but haven't used them myself.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Superb and Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Well balanced and Crisp sound. These present an audible difference to other major brands and focus on sound as well as design. I used my studio headphones and monitors to mix my own music and use these primarily to reference the mix and its always pretty much spot on. Take it from someone who makes music... these are good and inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Sam K Music

customer_reviews.title: Failure But Fast Replacement
customer_reviews.text: The earphones failed after seven months of one hour daily use. I do not listen to music but only podcasts so these $30 earphones were just fine. The company sent a new one under their three year warranty -- and didn't want the other one back -- in a few days. So, yes it probably failed too soon. But for the cost and their great service, I'm not unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Joseph

customer_reviews.title: At this price I didn't expected anything amazing but the reviews are good so I gave a ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an audiophile but I'm still very picky when it's about music. I usually spent lot money on headphones but I keep losing them in the subway =p After some research I found those RHA MA390 U. At this price I didn't expected anything amazing but the reviews are good so I gave a shop and I have no regrets. This sound is clear and they're offering good bass. So far I found those earbuds very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Aure

product_meta.title: RHA MA390 Universal: Noise Isolating Aluminium In-Ear Headphones with Universal Remote & Microphone, 3 Year Warranty included
product_meta.description:
The MA390 Universal in-ear headphones use RHA's signature noise isolating Aerophonic housing design and are built from aluminium for strength and longevity. The remote and mic are compatible with most phones for track, call and digital assistant control.

BOX CONTAINS
MA390 Universal in-ear headphone^3 pairs^silicone tips (S/M/L)^Carry pouch
feature_bullets: High quality, clear audio performance thanks to RHA's signature Aerophonic design
Universal remote & microphone for voice control via Google Assistant, Siri and more
Contains 3x pairs of noise isolating silicone ear tips and clothing clip for gym or sport use
